description:
Umwana urwaye cyangwa ukirutse Malariya akenera kunywa no kurya kenshi
mu rwego rwo kumurinda imirire mibi n’umwuma
title: Umwana urwaye cyangwa ukirutse Malariya akenera kunywa no kurya kenshi mu rwego rwo kumurinda imirire mibi n’umwuma
content:
Umwana urwaye cyangwa ukirutse Malariya akenera kunywa no kurya kenshi
mu rwego rwo kumurinda imirire mibi n’umwuma. Kumwonsa nabyo 
bimurinda umwuma ndetse na malariya.
